attributes.action: provide government funding for colleges to send text messages to students warning of cancellation to lessons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When students only hace one or two lessons a day and one of them is cancelled. Students should recieve a text telling them of cancellations. So no time or money is wasted getting to college to find out you could have been studying at home or working

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
